mapper.sql: REC_ID, USER_ID, CHANNEL, BILL_ID, BUSINESS, CREATE_DATE, EFFECTIVE_DATE, EXPIRE_DATE, OP_ID, ORG_ID, DONE_CODE, DONE_DATE, REMARK, STATE
mapper.select:
select
from user_order
and bill_id like concat('%',#{billId},'%')
and business=#{business}
mapper.insert: insert into user_order (REC_ID, USER_ID, CHANNEL, BILL_ID, BUSINESS, CREATE_DATE, EFFECTIVE_DATE, EXPIRE_DATE, OP_ID, ORG_ID, DONE_CODE, DONE_DATE, REMARK, STATE) values (#{recId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{channel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{billId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{business,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{effectiveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{expireDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{opId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{doneCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doneDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into user_order
REC_ID,
USER_ID,
CHANNEL,
BILL_ID,
BUSINESS,
CREATE_DATE,
EFFECTIVE_DATE,
EXPIRE_DATE,
OP_ID,
ORG_ID,
DONE_CODE,
DONE_DATE,
REMARK,
STATE,
#{recId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{channel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{billId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{business,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

mapper.update:
update user_order
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CHANNEL = #{channel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BILL_ID = #{billId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUSINESS = #{business,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EFFECTIVE_DATE = #{effectiveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EXPIRE_DATE = #{expireDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
OP_ID = #{opId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DONE_CODE = #{doneCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DONE_DATE = #{doneDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATE = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where REC_ID = #{recId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user_order set USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CHANNEL = #{channel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BILL_ID = #{billId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUSINESS = #{business,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EFFECTIVE_DATE = #{effectiveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EXPIRE_DATE = #{expireDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OP_ID = #{opId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DONE_CODE = #{doneCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DONE_DATE = #{doneDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATE = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER} where REC_ID = #{recId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT count(0) FROM user_info u, user_order o WHERE u.USER_ID=o.USER_ID AND NOW() BETWEEN u.EFFECTIVE_DATE and u.EXPIRE_DATE AND u.STATE=1 AND o.STATE=1
SELECT u.SP_CODE,o.BILL_ID,o.BUSINESS FROM user_info u, user_order o WHERE u.USER_ID=o.USER_ID and now() BETWEEN u.EFFECTIVE_DATE AND u.EXPIRE_DATE AND u.STATE=1 AND o.STATE=1 limit #{start},#{len}
